Intel.description: Intel Chip Manufacture and opensource software king.

OneAPI.description: Intel OneAPI allows for development of applications on heterogenous platforms.

Intel Software Guard Extensions (SGX).description: Provides security features for applications by enabling secure enclaves for sensitive operations.

Intel System Studio.description: Integrated development environment (IDE) for creating systems-level software, including tools for debugging, performance analysis, and optimization.

Intel VTune Profiler.description: A performance analysis tool that allows developers to optimize their applicationâ€™s performance across Intel CPUs and GPUs.

Intel IoT Gateways.name: Intel IoT Gateways
Intel IoT Gateways.description: Solutions bridging devices and the cloud for efficient data management in IoT applications.
